CustomField.formula: CASE( Contact.language__c , "de", if( CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "Contract"), "Mit freundlichen Grüßen", "")+ BR(), "nl","Met vriendelijke groet," + BR(), "en","Best regards," + BR(), "it","Cordiali Saluti," + BR(), "es","Saludos,"+ BR(), "fr","Bien cordialement,"+ BR(), "pl","Pozdrawiam"+ BR(), "pt","Atenciosamente"+ BR(), "" + BR() )
CustomField.label: zz_Signature_Closing
